statements: SELECT * FROM AppointmentReminders;
SELECT patient_id, message FROM AppointmentReminders;
SELECT reminder_id, appointment_date, reminder_date FROM AppointmentReminders;
SELECT * FROM AppointmentReminders WHERE reminder_date > NOW();
SELECT appointment_date, message FROM AppointmentReminders WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT reminder_id, appointment_date, patient_id, message, reminder_date FROM AppointmentReminders WHERE reminder_date > NOW() ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT reminder_id, patient_id, appointment_date, message FROM AppointmentReminders WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM AppointmentReminders WHERE appointment_date > '2022-11-01' AND patient_id = '456e789a-12d3-89b4-a123-456614174000' ORDER BY reminder_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, message, reminder_date FROM AppointmentReminders WHERE reminder_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id, appointment_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(reminder_id) AS total_reminders FROM AppointmentReminders GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_reminders > 3 ORDER BY total_reminders DESC

SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, reminder_sent FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT appointment_id, patient_name FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id

SELECT patient_name, email FROM patients WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 5 AND patient_id = 10;

SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointment_reminders ORDER BY reminder_id DESC;

SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, reminder_message FROM appointment_reminders WHERE patient_id = 123;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointment_history;

SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT reminder_message FROM appointment_reminders ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM appointment_history WHERE appointment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN appointment_history ON patients.patient_id = appointment_history.patient_id WHERE appointment_date < '2022-08-01';

SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%3456%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM appointments GROUP BY appointment_id, appointment_date;
SELECT appointment_date, patient_name, email FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;

SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent=true;

SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, reminder_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN reminders ON appointments.appointment_id = reminders.appointment_id;
